title: Bible Black 2.iso
description:
Title: Bible Black -The Infection-
Year: Japan 2008-07-25, English Version 2011-06-28
Length: Short (2 - 10 hours)
Developer: Kururi Active
Publishers: Kitty Media
Language: English
Voice: Japanese
Info: VNDB

Description:
Upon its release in 2000, Bible Black -La noche de Walpurgis made history with its tale of black magic and immoral situations wrapped in an occult setting. Now a sequel to that famous game has been announced! This new tales begins one month following the events of the earlier game, with the revelation that Kitami Reika, who should have died, has reappeared?! The protagonists are once again assailed by a nightmare!

1. Mount Bible Black 2.iso with Daemon Tools.
2. Install the game.
3. If you don't hear the music, click Sound Options > Music Options, check DirectSoundWave and restart the game.

System Requirements:
Pentium II 300 MHz
128 MB RAM
300 MB HDD
